name: swi_preprocess
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Pre-process the Susceptibility-weighted images and write out nifti files for feeding into PRELUDE (Phase Unwrapping Library of FSL).

inputs.description: Name of the scanner (one of ge, siemens or philips)
inputs.name: Scanner name

inputs.description: Name of the input GE file (only compatible with --scanner ge option)
inputs.name: GE input file

inputs.description: Name of the input Philips file (only compatible with --scanner philips option)
inputs.name: Philips input file

inputs.description: Name of the input Siemens magnitude file (only compatible with --scanner siemens option)
inputs.name: Siemens magnitude file

inputs.description: Name of the input Siemens phase file (only compatible with --scanner siemens option)
inputs.name: Siemens phase file

inputs.description: Name of the output magnitude file after preprocessing. Ensure it has a .nii suffix
inputs.name: Output magnitude file

inputs.description: Name of the output phase file after preprocessing. Ensure it has a .nii suffix
inputs.name: Output phase file

output-files.description: Output magnitude file in NIfTI format.
output-files.name: Output Magnitude File

output-files.description: Output phase file in NIfTI format.
output-files.name: Output Phase File
